title: Creating a Custom Digital Asset Management Solution with MarkLogic
abstract: Many companies have purchased an out of the box DAM solution only to find out that the services contained within require heavy customization or don’t fit the company’s evolving needs. After going through this exercise in the previous version of their DAM, Conde Nast has chosen to forgo this path and instead build a custom solution using MarkLogic and the xquerrail framework. This approach allows Conde Nast to build a flexible DAM solution which is tailored to their specific digital asset workflow and new content initiatives. Most importantly, by enabling their development teams to work in an Agile environment and continuously iterate on the DAM, Conde Nast has the flexibility to evolve in an ever changing publishing and media landscape

surveys.comments: Interesting to see the progression of solutions leading to MarkLogic.
Brian has a great knowledge of Conde Nast asset requirement-good talk
Interesting session with some good observations on digital asset management. Perhaps could have expanded a bit more on the process of technology selection.
Good overview of a built-on-MarkLogic solution. More legible slides (larger font) and hands-on demo would have added.
